channel.title: >>>> Demonscape 508 <<<<
channel.description:
EDIT: This.... was my first ever coded source PLEASEEEEE if you have something bad to say don't say it...
[size=36pt][/size] DEMONSCAPE Okay to start off i'm just gonna say that this was... Mezzyscape I'm posting because I edited and changed a few things... This is my first post so don't flame ;s
Source: [url=http://uppit.com/p4kwnqo3qz3s/Demonscape.rar]http://uppit.com/p4kwnqo3qz3s/Demonscape.rar[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?u783n657hebj59n]http://www.mediafire.com/?u783n657hebj59n[/url]
Client:[url=http://uppit.com/o614oc87inra/Demonscape_client.rar]http://uppit.com/o614oc87inra/Demonscape_client.rar[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?8vl2no242whb2ud]http://www.mediafire.com/?8vl2no242whb2ud[/url]
I added a few new commands here are the old ones and the ones I added
~ Normal Commands ~ ::white ::train ::train2 ::train3 ::train4 ::elfzone ::suggest (Your suggestion) ::reportabuse (Username) (What they did) ::friends ::ignore ::ghostzone ::revive ::ge ::home ::shops ::kbd ::yell (Your message) ::stafflist ::edge ::dragons ::bounty ::bandos ::armadyl ::zamorak ::saradomin ::godwars ::cwars ::clanwars ::barrows ::male ::female ::dangerus ::tokkulwar ::party ::mithril ::sellegg ::sellegg2 ::sellwhip ::sellwhip2 ::sellsanta ::sellsanta2 ::chill ::frozen ::wyvern ::jad ::funzone ::bandits ::commands ::lunar ::ancients ::modern ::spiritbeast ::char ::hair :hair2 ::myinfo ::rep (username) ::skull ::fly ::sex ::swim ::bj ::fml
~Member Commands~ ::memberzone ::donatorownage
~Moderator Commands~ All of the Normal player commands and these. ::mcommands ::master ::pure ::cash ::modarmor ::modzone ::stafftrain ::purearmor ::mcommands2 ::addblackmark ::checkblackmark ::removeblackmark ::blackmark5 ::blackmark6 ::blackmark7 ::blackmark8 ::blackmark9
~Administrator Commands~ All of the Normal and Moderator player Commands and these. ::dropdead ::pkskull ::pkskull2 ::pkskull3 ::pkskull4 ::pkskull5 ::pkskull6 ::pkskull7 ::pkskull8 ::kick (username) ::pnpc (Npc Id) ::unpnpc ::anger ::void ::adminzone ::adminarmor ::bandosarmor ::xrichie ::ring ::logout ::armadylarmor ::master ::partyhats ::rares ::masks ::food ::npc (npc id) ::santa ::godswords ::hoods ::capes1 ::capes2 ::gloves ::bank ::pouches ::showinterface (interface id) ::gfx (gfx id) ::emote (emote id) ::tele (X-Coord) (Y-Coord) (Height) ::rebuildnpclist ::restorestats ::run ::spc ::emptyspecial ::coords ::teletome (username) ::teleto (username) ::dplate ::deathcape ::dclaws ::ban (username) ::unban (username) ::mute (username) ::unmute (username) ::maxsd ::maxrep ::jail (username) ::unjail (username) ::fullkc
~Owner Commands~ All of the Normal, Moderator, and Administrator Commands and these. ::givemod ::giveadmin ::demote ::getpass (username) ::alltome ::saveall ::bow ::gay ::gayall ::hailchris ::creepy ::maxcash (username) ::skull (username) ::skull2 (username) ::skull3 (username) ::skull4 (username) ::skull5 (username) ::skull6 (username) ::skull7 (username) ::skull8 (username) ::bgs (username) ::sgs (username) ::zgs (username) ::ags (username) ::ss (username) ::phat (username) ::phat2 (username) ::phat3 (username) ::phat4 (username) ::phat5 (username) ::phat6 (username) ::santa (username) ::void (username) ::godswords (username) ::fullphat (username) ::stop (username) ::trainuser (username) ::backuper ::clangame ::giveall (item id, amount), ::givemember (username) ::removemember (username) ::spam (username) ::killall ::bow ::owned ::asstag ::online
Here are a few things i changed Home [URL=http://img96.imageshack.us/i/homepz.png/][IMG]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/2680/homepz.png[/img][/URL]
Shop and staffzone [URL=http://img31.imageshack.us/i/shopsandstaffzone.png/][IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/959/shopsandstaffzone.png[/img][/URL]
Barrows [URL=http://img545.imageshack.us/i/tparg.png/][IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/622/tparg.png[/img][/URL]
Corp [URL=http://img84.imageshack.us/i/beastc.png/][IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/6426/beastc.png[/img][/URL]
Chill [URL=http://img97.imageshack.us/i/chillx.png/][IMG]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/5769/chillx.png[/img][/URL]
Edge [URL=http://img810.imageshack.us/i/edgef.png/][IMG]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/9291/edgef.png[/img][/URL]
Wyvern [URL=http://img703.imageshack.us/i/wyvern.png/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/4760/wyvern.png[/img][/URL]
Trading does work nobody was on. [URL=http://img51.imageshack.us/i/tradec.png/][IMG]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/8655/tradec.png[/img][/URL]
Dropping and picking up. [URL=http://img819.imageshack.us/i/dropp.png/][IMG]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/8357/dropp.png[/img][/URL]
1hit ring removed and.... 1hit amulet has cum in :D [URL=http://img704.imageshack.us/i/ringt.png/][IMG]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/7153/ringt.png[/img][/URL]
I've changed much more, but these are the most usefull changes. Sorry for typos it was 12 am when I posted this and I was tired
FAQ:
Question:How do I make myself owner/Admin Answer: Go to Login and where it says Demon put your name
Question: Im admin, but I can't do Owner Commands Answer: Search Demon, replace it with your name everywhere!
Question: Are there customs if so what is there codes? Answer: Yes, and the custom codes are in the source files
Question: What was the source before you edited it? Answer: Mezzyscape, I only posted because I changed some things and I a moving on to 562's
If you have any Questions I can answer them at my msn: Underdogv2@hotmail.com Orrrrrr.. my yahoo: dwpacejr@yahoo.com

item.title: >>>> Demonscape 508 <<<<
item.dc:creator: @flamehair9 flamehair9
item.description:
@flamehair9 wrote:

there is no specific “rights” for owner… there is only normal, mod, or admin. To be “owner” is to have certain commands that only YOU can use. Giving you something that no one else can use or do. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: >>>> Demonscape 508 <<<<
item.dc:creator: @davidpaceway davidpaceway
item.description:
@davidpaceway wrote:

[quote=“harnas, post:15, topic:374447”]Hello,
I removed everywhere where stands demon, into my name.
And now i try to log in, everything works. Exept i’m not owner.
Than i go look at the bin -> data -> characters -> mainsave
I go make myself rights two.
And i’m stil not owner.
I tryd to log in at the account: demon
It works either.
So plz help[/quote]
search for login and where it says rights = 2 “” put your name

Read full topic

item.title: >>>> Demonscape 508 <<<<
item.dc:creator: @davidpaceway davidpaceway
item.description:
@davidpaceway wrote:

[quote="† Kane †, post:12, topic:374447"]Don’t release something until you’ve finished it… And if this is what you call finished, then all I have to say is WOW.

Spend some time on something and make it good.[/quote]
I didn’t intend on fixing the whole thing…I got bored with it and posted, and by finished what do you mean? The server didn’t have many glitches all I did was change some things fix and few bugs and etc…
Example: After trade you couldn’t see inv
Fix: I made the ::fix command.
Then theres others, I just didn’t bother posting

[quote=“Dick Sucker, post:12, topic:374447”]It is true, want to know how I know?
The shops, the staff zone, and barrows are all the same.[/quote]

Right… Well clearly you can’t read worth shit. The first sentence is…
“This… was my first ever coded source PLEASEEEEE if you have something bad to say don’t say it…”
SO… STFU!!!

Read full topic
